Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps60.serverSide.server

Class ServerThread

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.ps60.serverSide.server.ServerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ServerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
This class contains some methods to communicate between server and client.

    • ServerThread

      public ServerThread​(java.net.Socket soc, java.util.ArrayList<ServerThread> serverThreads)
      Initialization of socket ecc
      Parameters:
      soc - is the socket from the Class Server
      serverThreads - is the list of "ServerThread" of other sockets (one for each client connected)

  • Method Details

    • getPlayerBound

    • moveMessage

      public int moveMessage​(java.util.List<int[]>[] possible_choice, int[][] positionWorkers)
      Send the "move" command to the client to start the "Moving phase", then send the position of the workers and the possible moves.
      Parameters:
      possible_choice - available cells to move
      positionWorkers - positions of 2 workers
      Returns:
      the cell where the player wants to move (calculated automatically) which worker should move

    • buildMessage

      public int buildMessage​(java.util.List<int[]> possible_choice)
      Send the "build" command to che client to start the Building Phase, then send the possible builds.
      Parameters:
      possible_choice - Possible cells where to build
      Returns:
      Return the cell where the player wants to build

      Parameters:
      message - is the message that should be print on video
      Returns:
      The choice of the user. (1=true/yes 0=false/no)
